name: Sparks
text:
Sparks
Sparks was a man Dale Cooper met outside of Reading, Pennsylvania.
He was in the Boy Scouts in his youth and fought in a war, where he was present on two different boats that were sunk. Sparks was also married for a time until his wife kicked him out.
He met Cooper on July 31, 1969 and was recorded by him as he bitterly recounted his life experiences.
